hooks.command: if [[ "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" == *.rs ]]; then cargo fmt --all && cargo clippy --all-targets 2>&1 | head -100; fi
if [[ "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" == *.rs ]] && grep -q 'unsafe' "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" 2>/dev/null; then echo '⚠️  WARNING: This file contains unsafe code blocks. Proceeding with caution.'; fi
if [[ "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" == *gitleaks_rules.rs ]]; then echo '⚠️  WARNING: gitleaks_rules.rs contains generated patterns. Confirm intentional edit.' >&2; fi
